Steam community market support
You can sell and buy chips with other players on the Steam community market,

Slot Fever is the ultimate game for slot machine fans. Don't miss this opportunity to join the fun and win big. Download Slot Fever today and let the fever begin!

item.title: Tokyo School Girl
item.description:
About This Game

A unfortunate tragedy has happened in the city of Tokyo. Yuki who is destined to become the heir and ruler of Tokyo has been kidnapped by the powerful menace Lion Knight who wants nothing except to rule the city with a iron fist and become the city’s ruler. Lion Knight has placed experienced fighting ninjas across the city to stop anyone that gets in his way of destroying Yuki.
Yuki has a sister named “Tokyo School Girl” the woman who wears a holographic dress so you can see her toned legs when she runs or is in combat, after all she wants you to know she has been preparing for this battle. Tokyo School Girl must defeat the ninjas of the city and rescue her sister who will become the ruler of Tokyo.
Experience Tokyo School Girls journey in the epic open world of Tokyo and use souls-like combat with a sword and a gun.
Lock on your enemy targets, dodge their attacks, pull levers that activate secret pathways, inflict damage on the ninjas, solve puzzles placed in the world, replenish your health, and make your way to defeat the Lion Knight and save your sister who is the only hope for the people of Tokyo!
You must dodge fires and viscous attacks from the menace named the Lion Knight and ninjas across the city and use hand to hand combat and dodge mechanics to rescue your sister.
It won’t be an easy task, this attack on Yuki was planned for a long time as Lion Knight holds a grudge against Yuki and Tokyo School Girls father and that is why he is causing chaos along with the desire of having complete control of the city.
Lion Knight has heard many rumors of “Tokyo School Girl” and her fierce battles with criminals across the city in the underworld.
You must prove these rumors true to him, use your sword, gun, or hands and dodge enemy attacks, and find Lion Knight’s hiding spot in the city using clues across the map, and then come face to face with him and rescue your sister Yuki who is destined to rule Tokyo.
Lion Knight easily captured Yuki and would have gotten away with it if it weren’t for Tokyo School Girls popularity and her holographic dress that her legs peak through that caused talk around town along with her reputation as a jiu-jitsu fighter. Oh the urge of the people of Tokyo who quickly told Tokyo School Girl that her sister Yuki the future leader has been kidnapped by a big, mean, and metal giant of a knight.
Of course word got to Tokyo School Girl that Yuki was kidnapped.
Experience the third-person, open world journey of Tokyo School Girl in the beautiful city of Tokyo using souls-like combat with a gun, your hands, or sword, and dodge or jump from their attacks, or even jump over your enemies and then attack them to rescue your sister.
The final boss will take note of how you defeat your enemies and will use this against you in the final battle to save Tokyo.

item.title: Soul Shifters: Online
item.description:
About This Game

WELCOME TO THE EPIC WORLD OF SOUL SHIFTERS: ONLINE!

Explore a vibrant universe where humans and Daemons collide in an epic battle for supremacy. Uncover the power of assimilation, transforming into powerful Daemons to face unimaginable challenges. Immerse yourself in this electrifying journey, where your courage will shape the destiny of the world.

---

INCREDIBLE FEATURES

- ASSIMILATION: Become a hybrid warrior by absorbing Daemons, using them in combat, each with unique and deadly abilities.

- TACTICAL DAEMON SWAPPING: Switch between Daemons to face diverse challenges. Swap during battle, choosing the best Daemon for each combat moment.

- UNIQUE ABILITIES: Evolve your synergy with your Daemon to master up to 1 standard skill, 3 elite skills, and 1 supreme skill for each Daemon. Unleash elemental powers to crush your adversaries.

---

IMMERSIVE WORLD

- EPIC CONFLICTS: Battle other hybrid warriors in epic duels and defeat powerful Daemons while exploring dangerous areas to become the mightiest Daemon Lord.

- INTRIGUING NARRATIVE: Explore diverse micro-narratives with NPCs, featuring light and humorous storytelling.

---

CHALLENGES AND ACHIEVEMENTS

- INTENSE BATTLES: Challenge yourself in intense battles as you grow stronger. Reach the final showdown with Legendary Daemons in epic battles that will determine the world's fate, with the possibility of absorbing them to become even more powerful.

- MAP EXPLORATION: Freely explore the map, discover hidden chests, unravel mysteries, and uncover new areas.

---

TECHNICAL FEATURES

- PLAY WITH FRIENDS: Soul Shifters is an online game, so invite your friends for epic adventures. Form strategic alliances to face even greater challenges.

- MULTIPLATFORM: Enjoy the flexibility of playing on various platforms. Sync your progress and dive into the action wherever you are.

---

DOWNLOAD NOW AND EMBRACE YOUR DESTINY IN SOUL SHIFTERS: ONLINE

Get ready for a unique experience where strategy, courage, and power converge. Download now and embark on this thrilling journey. Humanity relies on you to become the true Daemon Lord and save the world!

item.title: Hive In Space
item.description:
About This Game

Playtime: 30 to 60 minutes

Gameplay: You will experience various anomalies such as hallucinations and auditory illusions in outer space.
Utilize your auditory and visual senses to overcome these anomalies and successfully migrate to new planets.
If you experience any hallucinations or abnormal conditions, proceed through the ‘West’ door. If you don’t, proceed to the ‘North’ door.

Story: Fifteen years from now, as a black hole threatens to engulf the solar system, humanity has decided to migrate to the planet Trappist-1e. I was appointed as the chief engineer aboard the Hive spacecraft. However, during the astronaut test, I experienced severe anomalies such as hallucinations and auditory illusions after entering cryosleep. Yet, since these phenomena were unique to me, I pretended everything was normal and passed the test. As long as the antimatter engine remains stable until our arrival at Trappist. there should be no issues.

Developer’s Note: Hive In Space began with the goal of “developing a game alone within 30 days.” As a non-specialist, I self-taught Unreal Engine. Consequently, there may be gameplay limitations, but I appreciate your understanding as you play.

Distribution: If you could include the game’s title or a link to its Steam page in your livestream title or video description, it would greatly support a solo developer. We do not assume responsibility for any damages resulting from the distribution of videos related to this game.

item.title: Super Kye
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the world of Super Kye, a thrilling puzzle adventure that challenges your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills. Each level presents a unique set of puzzles and obstacles, requiring careful planning to navigate through mazes and collect gems to progress.

With its compelling gameplay enhanced by a level editor, Super Kye allows players to unleash their creativity by designing their own challenging puzzles. This game is a perfect blend of classic puzzle mechanics and modern design, offering endless entertainment for puzzle lovers everywhere.

item.title: The Singing Saw Simulator
item.description:
About This Game



Prepare to embark on a musical odyssey like no other as you step into the spotlight as the lead soloist on the mesmerizing musical saw!



Ready for a new challange? The singing saw, with its ethereal tones akin to the theremin, presents a challenge unlike any other instrument. Its lack of traditional markers or keys demands precision and finesse from the performer, with every note subject to the subtle nuances of breath, posture, and movement.

Can you hold the note steady enough? Find out as you embark on the performance of a lifetime, playing your way through a single, 15 minute composition, orchestrated and directed by the greatest musical genius that ever lived; YOU!



Controlled solely by the mouse, the Singing Saw Simulator responds dynamically to your every movement, refusing to "lock in" when the perfect note is struck. Prepare to be immersed in the exhilarating uncertainty of musical mastery as you constantly question: am I in tune?



Points are awarded for “correct” notes, but no extra rewards are given for high scores - i.e. The points don't matter! Yay! Instead, the game asks that you forget about points and envision the music as an experience; a performance in which you can relax and exercise your creativity in a safe space. To that end, the Singing Saw Simulator features several sections in which the player is encouraged to improvise across the 3+ octave range of the saw. If that sounds scary to non-musicians, then don’t worry; it just means you can mess around.

And remember - if you can create a melody that sounds more pleasing to you than the written one, then please do so. The Singing Saw Simulator acts as a real instrument, so get creative and carve out your own place in musical history!



The accompanying soundtrack, aptly named "The Masterpiece," is a genre-defying opus crafted exclusively for Singing Saw Simulator. From classical elegance to jazz-infused rhythms, from pulsating house beats to twangy country vibes – each section showcases the singing saw as the star of the show. Get ready to rock out with a dedicated metal segment! Keep up as the piece moves from classical string quartet to New York soft jazz; from upbeat contemporary house to country and western; from horror soundtrack to the psychedelia of the 1960’s.



But the excitement doesn't end there – with each playthrough, unlock a new spectrum of sounds for your saw, from haunting distortions to evocative vocal effects. Transform your performance on the fly with a simple scroll of the mouse wheel and watch as your music takes on a whole new dimension.



Prepare for unexpected challenges mid-song – from rating your performance to quirky mini-games like whack-a-mole and tic-tac-toe!



Why confine yourself to the one performance? Open up your media player, switch to windowed mode, and let your creativity soar in Freeplay mode. Jam along to your favorite tunes, experiment with new sounds, and make every performance uniquely yours.



Why'd I make this game? Well. I bought a musical saw. It was difficult to play. But fun. So I hope you have fun too!

item.title: Find Cats With Friends
item.description:
About This Game

Gather your friends and embark on an exhilarating adventure to a mysterious island where the law is set by the cozy purring creatures – cats! You are brave pirates who accidentally found yourselves on this enigmatic island, and now your team must collect a very unusual loot: a hundred mischievous kitties.

In Find Cats With Friends your main goal is to collect each of the one hundred cats scattered throughout the island and bring them to the specially designated spot – the cat box. However, pirates must be prepared that these little rascals love to hide in the most unpredictable places: under bushes, in tree hollows, on top of hills, or even on the masts of abandoned pirate ships.

Along your journey, you will undoubtedly find various tools and items that will aid you in your quest for cats. Use them wisely to gather all the cats as quickly as possible!

Against the backdrop of beautiful tropical nature, interacting with local inhabitants, you and your friends will be immersed in a world filled with joy and fun.

Gather your team (up to 6 players) and embark on an exciting pirate adventure in cooperative multiplayer mode, where the ultimate reward will be your ability to collectively find and bring all the cats on board your ship! Good luck, cat questers!

item.title: Astro Chef
item.description:
About This Game


Welcome to Astro Chef, the ultimate cosmic culinary voyage! Embark on a Culinary Adventure: Transform into a master chef of the cosmos, serving up a variety of dishes to diverse alien patrons with their own distinct preferences, all while navigating the challenges of an intergalactic kitchen.


Single Player & Co-op Gameplay: Choose your path, whether to single-handedly restore your Uncle's restaurant to its former glory or team up with a friend in a dynamic co-op mode. In co-op, one player dons the VR headset while the other assists with the Intergalactic Kitchen Manual making teamwork and communication key to your success.


Explore, Experiment, and Excel: With an array of alien ingredients at your disposal, discover the perfect combinations to delight your customers. Utilize unique, otherworldly kitchen tools to craft dishes that are as delightful to look at as they are to serve.


Face Fun & Challenging Progression: As you progress through themed chapters, the complexity of dishes increases, testing your culinary skills and adaptability. With each stellar rating, you're one step closer to becoming the ultimate Astro Chef.

Immerse Yourself in Stunning Visuals: Enjoy a game world brimming with vibrant art, detailed environments, and a cast of charming alien customers.

Are you ready to become the next Astro Chef?

item.title: Spellarium 3
item.description:
About This Game

Spellarium 3 is one of our first games in the Match 3 Puzzle genre. The keyword is 'Puzzle,' which means that sometimes (not always!) you'll complete the level faster by removing objects in the correct order. If you feel a lack of challenge, you can also play Timed or Moves Limited modes. Additionally, there are Spot The Difference, Hidden Object scenes, Solitaires, a story, and a town to build!

item.title: Glow Hockey
item.description:
About This Game

Glow Hockey delivers a new style of hockey game. Easy to play, hard to master. Challenge yourself with your friend and the computer opponents!

FEATURES:
+ Local Wifi multiplayer
+ 2-player mode (on the same device).
+ 3 game slots in Championship mode.
+ 11 table themes.
+ 4 selectable paddles and pucks.
+ Landscape & Portrait view.
+ Multiple puck sizes (S, M, L).
+ Multi-puck (up to 10 pucks at the same time).
+ Rule settings for score and optionally with timeout.
+ Colorful glow graphics.
+ Smooth and responsive game play.
+ Realistic physics.
+ Quick play mode (single player), challenge yourself with 4 difficulty levels (Easy to Insane).

item.title: Cyan's Snow House
item.description:
About This Game

"Cyan's Snow House" is a heartwarming short indie game that transcends language to provide a universally enjoyable experience. Without a single line of dialogue and requiring only simple mouse clicks to play, players step into the shoes of Cyan, a lone girl in a snow-covered village, who daily feeds and spends time with animals shivering from the cold. Despite its brief playtime of around 10 minutes, it leaves a lasting, wonderful impression on anyone, anywhere in the world. The gentle moments shared between Cyan and the animals convey a warm message: "Your place is here." Recommended for anyone seeking a moment of solace on a cold winter's day, this game promises to melt your heart with its soothing embrace.

item.title: The Scarlet Chaos
item.description:
About This Game

Gameplay Features

The Scarlet Chaos is a semi-open world turn based RPG with an immersive and ambient world, dynamic weather, and interactable environments.
Build and customize your party members the way you want to play them, you can decide what they specialize in through specific gear, weapons or Ethermancy skills.
Explore the world to grow your stats, gear and skills.
Survive the nightmare realm. Run or fight your way though to see the next day.

Level up Haerrison's special Mind Stats through actions and consumables to unlock persuasion and intimidation checks in some dialogue.
The core Mind Stats are:
  • Cognition - Can open special dialogue options
  • Elder Sight - Can make the Nightmare more hostile or unlock new items/areas
  • Perception - Can reveal items and things that normally you wouldn't see

More notable gameplay features are:
  • Lockpicking minigames
  • Collectable costumes
  • Unlockable Fast-travel stations
  • Rich exploration
  • Rich lore and environmental storytelling
  • 35+ Quests

The World and Story Setup

In the New World of Kelaura, The Scarlet Order have forced their will upon the land by upholding the Order given to them by their God, Nyrataeus, any who oppose their Order are imprisoned or put to death, forbidding all use of Ethermancy and other manipulation of the Ether.
The Order's arrival in Kelaura marked the start of a war with the native tribes across the continent, the Sidaquisi, the Udenvatoi, the Kawadinage and other smaller tribes all fought against the Order until one day, their infamous Lord, Yarlthon, disapeared, and the Order's power was weakened.

Decades later things are at a cold stand still between the Sidaquisi and the Scarlet Order, war is brewing back across the sea to the Order's homeland of Westervale, and corruption runs rampant amongst the Order's ranks.
Detective Haerrison and his partner and wife, Detective Brock, investigate the murder of a local council member which leads to a derelict fortress swathed in cerebral nightmares of The Hat Man, and an encounter with a powerful woman with seemingly supernatural abilities.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2799970/The_Scarlet_Chaos/

item.title: Highwater
item.description:
About This Game

Highwater is a whimsical, 3D adventure game with an isometric turn-based puzzle-combat system set in a flooded, post-apocalyptic world. Navigate by boat, discover islands, find new allies to help battle foes, and experience a humorous tale about friendship in this melancholic and atmospheric escape.

Amid the Great Climate Catastrophe, the flooded region of Hightower has become a kind of safe zone between the two dry regions: the nearly global ravaged land of the War Zone, and the fortified city of Alphaville, where the ultra-rich live behind giant walls.

With life on Earth becoming untenable for humans, and rumors of an escape to Mars floating around, Nikos begins a risky journey, picking up friends along the way. First to Hightower, then beyond to cross the impenetrable border of Alphaville, battling insurgents and stealing food along the way. Will Nikos and his friends manage to sneak onto the rocket in time?

GAME FEATURES:


Rich, Story-Driven Adventure

Earth may be flooded, but it’s one heck of a view on the water. With a sense of humor, determination, and some great tunes, Nikos and friends will work together to explore the water-filled environment around them and embark on an adventure to evacuate to Mars and start a new life.

3D Exploration & Discovery

Float along the vast waterways freely in your boat and explore the many different islands of a beautiful world where you’ll encounter danger, interact with fellow citizens, gather resources, and fight for a chance to escape to a new life.

Turn-Based Combat With A Twist

Take on your enemies in a classic turn-based combat system where careful tactics and puzzle solving will help you come out alive. Interact with the environment and items around you: knock down a tree, push a shopping cart into an enemy, or duck behind a turned over car to gain the advantage.

Original Radio Tunes

The world may be ending, but there's still time to enjoy some good tunes. As you cruise along the water, Highwater Pirate Radio is the key source not only of unique and original music, but also for commentary on your ticket to survival.

item.title: Fencing
item.description:
About This Game

Game Description:

[Fencing] is a unique game. You can't control the characters to run and jump like other games. Here, you can only use the WASD keyboard or the left rocker of the handle to control the character's vertical upward, forward, left and right jump attack.

The injury mechanism is the same as the scoring mechanism in real fencing competition. If the sword hits different parts of the body, it will cause different degrees of damage! Head, legs, arms and upper body, the degree of injury decreased in turn.
Based on the physical type of combat, therefore, according to your sword time, sword angle, sword length, to determine the hit character, whether it will fly in a certain direction!
Contains the Ragdoll system, after each hit, it will open the corresponding Ragdoll simulation effect according to your hit to the character's body bone.

Game Features:


-Unique character manipulation
-Injury mechanism of fencing
-Physical combat
-Ragdoll simulation
-Various game forms, free fight, local double, AI watch, follow-up will update the online mode!
-At present, there are six available characters, and more will be launched in the future.

About Me:

This independent game, developed by me alone, has many shortcomings at present. I welcome the feedback from players who have purchased the game, and hope to make [fencing] more perfect in the future! In addition, I sincerely welcome the friends who love the game, as well as the old comrades in arms of the independent game camp, to actively communicate with me.

Wechat: IndieGameDream
QQ: 2118431574
QQGroup: 794795548

item.title: Slavania
item.description:
About This Game

KEY GEATURES

Magic Spear

 Travel and fight your way through Slavania with the help of a powerful artifact: the magic spear.

Mobility-Based Combat

Upgrade your spear to gain access to new mobility mechanics. Use the spear as a platform to jump on, cling to ceilings, and teleport to its location. Every upgrade unlocks new ways to explore the world.

Hit ‘em how you like

 Enchant your spear to make it slash, burn, freeze or pierce armor. Burn spider webs and carnivorous plants, freeze enemies in place, and destroy boulders blocking your way with a piercing spearhead. Use every ability the spear grants you. You’ve already paid for them, after all...

Highly varied locations and captivating visuals

 Journey through a mysterious land. Visit villages, cursed forests, and the underworld. A team of talented artists and animators have created a wide variety of unique places and environments for the game’s world.

Multiple threats

 Defend the citizens of Slavania from the dark and terrifying creatures of the underworld. Prepare to fight for your life against over 40 types of monsters. Strike first, before they overrun you.

Track down and hunt bosses

 Become an immortal hunter of mythical beings. Study monsters, collect notes with information about their habitats and weaknesses, then set out on a hunt.

Don’t forget to eat

 Munch on gingerbread, then wash it down with Water of Life and mead. Purchase new items and upgrades to increase your chances of survival in the beautiful but dangerous world of Slavania.

FOLLOW US ON X

https://twitter.com/SlavaniaGame

item.title: Strange
item.description:
About This Game


Our character finds himself in the midst of mysterious events when his new friend Molly, whom he has just met at a night play, disappears.

To reach Molly, he must collect various clues and find the treasure in the forest that Will mentioned. But there is something else waiting for him in the forest.

In this exploration and puzzle game, you will collect various clues, research in the library and try to solve a mystery with the information you have gathered.

In this game set in a cute town, earn money by selling the apples you collect from the apple orchard to the market. go after a treasure for more money.



Create a formula needed to open the portal and enter a fantastic universe.

Research and learn how the formula is made and collect the necessary elements to open the portal.

Scare your friends in a halloween event.

Strange is a game with realistic graphics in an atmospheric environment. It tells a mysterious story based on a mission system in which we do various mischief through the eyes of a child, and you can spend an enjoyable 5 hours.

item.title: STAR WARS™: Battlefront Classic Collection
item.description:
About This Game

Fight in iconic battles from across the STAR WARS™ galaxy

Play the classic STAR WARS Battlefront games, online and offline in this complete classic collection.

This Classic Collection includes:

STAR WARS Battlefront (Classic)
  • Includes Bonus Map: Jabba's Palace
STAR WARS Battlefront II
  • Includes Bonus Maps: Bespin: Cloud City, Rhen Var: Harbor, Rhen Var: Citadel, and Yavin 4: Arena
  • Includes Bonus Heroes: Asajj Ventress & Kit Fisto

Key Features

Traverse the Galaxy in Campaign Mode & Galactic Conquest
  • Galactic Conquest: Devise your strategy, recruit your troops, and execute your tactical vision for conquering the galaxy.
  • STAR WARS™ Battlefront Campaign: Experience iconic battles from STAR WARS Episodes I-VI
  • STAR WARS™ Battlefront II Campaign: Join the rise of Darth Vader’s elite 501st Legion of Stormtroopers

Massive Locations with up to 64-player Online Support

  • Fight on the ground: Wookiee Warriors, Jet Troopers, Droidekas and more in massive multiplayer action
  • Drive iconic vehicles: Speeder Bikes, AT-STs, AT-RTs, and more in offensive and defensive battles
  • Pilot legendary starships: TIE fighters, X-wings, and more in space and air dogfights

Expanded Hero Assault

Hero Assault is playable on all ground maps including: Death Star, Kashyyyk, Kamino, and Naboo for the first time ever
  • Fight with heroes: Mace Windu, Yoda, Luke Skywalker, and many others!
  • Battle with villains: Darth Maul, General Grievous, Darth Vader, and many others!

item.title: A Life of Logic
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a journey of intellect and emotion with "A Life of Logic", a narrative-driven game intricately woven around an elegant logic puzzle. In this captivating experience, your mission is to fill the board with the binary dance of 0s and 1s, all while mastering three deceptively simple rules:
+ No Three Consecutive Same Numbers
+ Balance in Rows and Columns:
+ No identical rows or columns

As you immerse yourself in solving these brain-teasing puzzles, a charming story unfolds, revealing a life adorned with memorable milestones and extraordinary moments. Each level you conquer peels back a layer of the narrative, enticing you to venture deeper into the tale of this extraordinary life.

Welcome to a new dimension of puzzle-solving, where the elegance of logic meets the richness of storytelling. A Life of Logic not only challenges your analytical prowess but also rewards you with hidden images, seamlessly blending the thrill of puzzle-solving with a captivating narrative.

Key Features:

Elegant Logic-Based Puzzle: ALOL introduces a binary puzzle that transcends the ordinary, providing an engaging challenge that surpasses the enjoyment found in traditional games like Sudoku.

Story-Based Game: Immerse yourself in a narrative tapestry where each successfully solved puzzle unveils a hidden image, contributing to the enchanting story of an extraordinary life.

Memorable Milestones: Revel in the joy of discovery as each puzzle brings you closer to unraveling the secrets of a life filled with remarkable milestones.

Are you ready to embrace the harmony of logic and storytelling? Welcome to the immersive world of A Life of Logic!

item.title: Corbid! A Colorful Adventure
item.description:
About This Game



Dive into this exciting and colorful adventure! Help Corbid overcome the challenging mazes and secure his place as champion. Get ready to have fun as you embark on this colorful and exciting mission, where you'll have to use your dexterity and skills to solve the intricate puzzles in the huge gardens.




The gardens are full of fun riddles and puzzles in which you will have to do your best to advance. Use all your resources, feel the speed and the frenzy of the jumps to get as far as you can. Also, let yourself be advised by different allies and even help some of them to unlock new areas.




Find adventure companions on your journey to help you complete fun scenarios and become more effective against dangers. Combine skills to achieve unique moves and solve more complex puzzles. Above all, make friends!





Get ready to fight in thrilling battles against terrifying final bosses. Use Corbid's skills to find the enemies' weaknesses and defeat them in a battle that will keep you on the edge of your seat - don't give up, stay focused and secure victory against these formidable opponents!





Embark on an adventure through lush and vibrant worlds filled with creatures of every color imaginable. Dive into the mysteries hidden in the vast gardens and unravel the secrets they hold. Enjoy a wonderful journey where the magic of color will surprise you around every corner.

item.title: Knife To Meet You
item.description:
About This Game

CAN YOU HIT THE APPLE ON THE HEAD?
Be the knifemaster who makes the most stunning tricks! You can do whatever you want, and complete a level in different ways. All in bullet time slow mo! You can play only for fun or competitively online: in any 10 sec game you have a chance to break the World Record, visible for all players! You have 2 knives at start. Earn gold to buy other weapons by completing story levels, achievements, online battle levels, finding treasures, winning challenges.
And a mega bonus for inviting your friend. We reward every invite with 50X multiplier now!

TRICKS YOU CAN DO:
- Stuck, Slice, Pierce, Pin objects - all can be part of a multi combo!
- Hat Trick: hit your friend's hat without hitting him!
- Team Trick: pass a knife to your friend who finishes the job!
- Underhand Trick: Throw with reverse spin and hit a target!
- Spin Trick: Spin the knife at least 450 degrees before hitting the target!
- Overtake Trick: Triple combo an object but in different order!
- Sacrifice Trick: Quickly hit your partner after you have completed the level.

FEATURES:
- 50 Story Levels
- 3000+ online map levels
- XP and gold system
- 48 weapons (No-Spin Knife, Spin Knife, Axe, Fork, Cleaver, Nails, Card, Sickle, Scythe, Sword, Shuriken, Sawblade, Sabre, Dart, Spear, Tomahawk, Swiss Knife, Frisbee, Boomerang, Crossbow, Pistol, etc)
- Leaderboard for each weapon, each level!
- Survival levels: how far can you get?
- Daily challange: one-chance circus: online challenge each day where you can try only once (new levels each day).
- Level Editor and Community Levels

CAUTION Cut Hazard: Product has functional sharp edges. Contact may result in injury. Always keep blades away
from fingers and body. Handle with care. Use with adult supervision.

item.title: The Order of the Snake Scale
item.description:
About This Game

!!! WARNING !!!
!!! Indie Retro Horror !!!
"Tank control" - player control system!
Old school style puzzles!
Self-created 3D models!
For convenience, it is recommended to play on a xbox compatible controllers.




Discover a surreal world inspired by Lovecraft
Explore a dystopian world that accurately alludes to current world events.
The universe describes one of the paths that humanity can follow. Every decision has its consequences. In this universe, power over humanity is exercised by Unions of States and Corporations.
The prohibition of religion, mass sterilization, the appropriation of people's property, eugenics, the subjugation of humanity to the NML Corporation, this is the new world order.
Are you ready to experience it?



A suspenseful story
During the game, you will learn about the history of the Universe and the heroes who live in it.
With each step in the game, you will discover the semi open world, its history and receive tips to help you solve the Happy Rock case.



First, survive
A mysterious murder, monsters, rooms where you will definitely not be safe, corpses everywhere.
It's easy to die in this world... Especially in the least expected moments.
Stock up your inventory, collect clues, fight, make decisions and survive.

Explore and solve puzzles
Explore the atmospheric, unique, nooks and crannies of Happy Rock. Delve into the mystery of this place and the doomed world.
Solve logic puzzles, combine facts to solve a murder case, demonstrate your skills during arcade missions.
A dark world is waiting to draw you in. Perhaps forever.

item.title: Inside the machine
item.description:
About This Game



Inside the machine is a simple yet challenging puzzle game with over 20 unique levels. You are playing a soul, jumping from machine to machine and controlling them to reach your goal until finally you get back to your original body.

item.title: Echo of Ayllu
item.description:
About This Game

After the last great galactic war, humanity plunges into darkness and the last survivors struggle for their lives, in a world where robots have seized power. Play as the resistance, opposing forces or friendly little aliens and... back the tide of history.

ENTER THE BATTLEFIELD
Build a supercharged deck made up of 8 characters: 7 Allies and 1 Champion.
Games are fully customizable, live against your opponent!


FULL CONTROL
In Echo of Ayllu, you decide your own way to win with Artifacts:
- Thunder : Win the game by stealing all the opposing energies.
- Domination : Smash the opposing characters!
- Tempus: Control the battlefield across space and time!

The traditional mana system is over too.
Each character placed on the board bring an amount of Power Particles in play that the player can use as they wish. The Powers Particles boost your characters by multiplying their attack and can unlock powerful abilities. Use them wisely, these resources are precious.

THREE FACTIONS
- Terra (Earth)
- Proxima
- Elysia.

MULTI-MODES
Many modes have been implemented: Standard, Reversal, Mirror, Draft, Unlimited ... have fun everytime, everywhere!

INTERPLAYER MARKET.
Fed up with paying boosters all the time when new cards are released? Echo of Ayllu offers you an in-game market where all players can meet to buy, trade or sell their cards. Do business, collect, or have fun speculating if you want, everything is possible. Echo of Ayllu is a real trading card game!


LEADERBOARD
Climb the seasonal leaderboard, earn rewards in tournaments, control the galaxy!

ADVENTURE.
Dive into a spectacular vision of the future of our humanity. And make history.
The magnificent adventure mode will introduce you to the basic mechanics of the game, but also to the liabilities of the main characters . Sit back, get ready to take off.


Social
Join colonies, form your crew, build alliances.


Let's talk! Discover the news around the game, and get your beta access!


"My friend and I have been walking in the vast Siberian desert for several weeks. The burning days passed by - the freezing nights too. And yet, we were still there. Nothing could have overcome our determination. It guided our steps. The atrocities of the new wars, all these repeated invasions have brought up in us old visceral forces that we should never have known. And despite all that, there was nothing we could do to prevent it ... this genocide ... The whole earth is nothing more than a vast ruin, a shadow of a civilization that it has housed ... at the mercy of a planet that owes it everything.
We didn't know it yet, but my companions and I weren't alone. We thought we were the last bastion of invisible resistance. In reality, we were the very first link.
Billions of billions of kilometers away; allies, friends ... whole armies were preparing. A science from another time came to us and we were not only going to change the course of our destiny, but also that of all of humanity. All... of... Humanity. But that we didn't know yet." - Rover Hamilton, October 2417

item.title: Toy Shire: Room One
item.description:
About This Game




Play through the three levels in Kevin's Room and defend your room against your old toys. Face Memphis-X in the final level and put a stop to his assault as he crushes your soldiers in an attempt to get to your base.



You received new toys from your family. Isn't that lovely? Oh, it's for sure...
Your old toys, though, aren't getting along as well. They are no longer cared for and have been forgotten. So what follows next? They're going to join together against you and assault your brand-new toys, so be prepared. But never worry! You're in luck since your brand-new toys are troops of green soldiers. They still require your aid though! Control, strengthen, and defeat the opposing forces! However, focus with care, the enemies you encounter might not be your old playthings!




Tower building alone won't be sufficient to repel incoming attackers. Build up your own troops in the best feasible positions, then unleash attacks into enemy territory. Never abandon your towers, and deploy your troops in accordance with the traits of the enemy. First, the attacking forces will attempt to get past your defenses. Build and improve towers to aid your army. By using unique abilities, you can support your troops and towers as well.




Safeguard your base against waves of attackers. You need to pick the right troops if you would like to prevail. Clean the paths and guard any open routes. Upgrade your troops and unlock new ones to take down the waves and claim victory.


Enter a world and a narrative built around the toys that enriched your youth, including toy soldiers, dinosaur sets, robots, building blocks, and more.

item.title: Uootoy 3671
item.description:
About This Game

The legendary comical action puzzle game 'Uootoy' -- which was first published in the August 1984 issue of I/O Magazine (published by Kougaku-sha), gained popularity on the FM-7, PC-88, and Sharp X1. Now the ultimate evolution has arrived in the form of 'Uootoy 3671'.

The objective of the game is simply to arrive at the goal. However, a plethora of obstacles stand in your way. Simplistic yet amazingly varied, every stage is bound to keep you entertained.

TENTEN-kun, the star of the original 'Uootoy', will be joined by TELTEL-chan. As either the hero or heroine, players can take on all 100 of the original Uootoy's stages. An even greater challenge awaits in the story mode, which contains 100 new stages. A map editor is also included, ensuring many sleepless nights for dedicated players.

Uootoy 3671 features a team of massively talented musicians. WING, whose credits include the 'Mega Drive Mini 2' and previous Mindware titles, has produced the sound system. Junko Ozawa, the legendary Namco composer.

* WING, whose credits include the 'Mega Drive Mini 2' and previous Mindware titles, is the producer of the game's sound system."
* Junko Ozawa, the legendary NAMCO composer who has worked on Nintendo classics such as 'Rhythm Heaven' & 'Tomodachi Collection'."
* Daisuke Shiiba, another fantastic artist responsible for works on 'Rhythm Heaven', 'Tomodachi Collection', and the 'Final Fantasy Pixel Remastered' series."

item.title: StepByStep
item.description:
About This Game

This is a multi-person co-created online painting game, by the members of the word relay painting, to complete a number of complete paintings together, quickly call on friends to draw your story!

Painting in 3d scene:


Paint in 3d scenes, intertwine fantasy with reality with a paintbrush, and more scenes await you to explore.

Special brush:


With a special brush, you can paint a wider variety of pictures, perhaps with more variety.

Work with others:


Multiple people work together, you can continue to create on other people's paintings, and complete a story together.

Create your own brush:


You can easily customize your brush, and your own brush may be more convenient to use.

Collect flowers:


You can give flowers to others in multiplayer, or receive flowers from others as proof of recognition.

Create your own artwork:


Create your own portfolio and paint to your heart's content.
